description: Try our easy to follow Cucumber & Dill Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sauce,Halal,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Cucumber & Dill Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 140g cucumber, peeled, seeded, and finely sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all the sauce ingredients in a bowl, mixing well.
Season with salt and pepper. Serve chilled.
